Subtitle: AMBRA LIMONCELLO SPRITZ _
Description: Zesty and refreshing blend of vibrant limoncello, sparkling prosecco, and a splash of soda water. Each sip bursts with bright, tangy citrus, balanced by the effervescence of bubbles, leaving a crisp, invigorating finish that’s perfect for sunny days._
Method: Add ingredients to glass_;Fill with ice_;Stir gently to mix_;Garnish__

Subtitle: ACT OF TREASON
Description: The margarita bursts with vibrant citrusy tang, mellowed by the warmth of tequila and a hint of sweet orange liqueur. Its crisp, invigorating sip is like a sunny escape in a glass, often enhanced by the briny zest of a salted rim.
Method: Add all ingredients to  cocktail shaker_;Fill with ice & shake_;Strain, or dump into a salt rimmed glass

Subtitle: ARCHIE ROSE _
Description: Offering a bright and herbaceous blend of zesty lime, refreshing mint, and the smooth botanical notes of gin. Its light, effervescent sip feels like a cool breeze on a warm summer day, leaving a crisp, clean finish._
Method: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker_;Fill with ice & shake_;Double strain into chilled Coupe glass_

Subtitle: ARCHIE ROSE WHISKY _
Description: Delivering a rich, velvety harmony of sweet orange juice, smoky scotch, and the deep fruitiness of cherry liqueur. Each sip is warm and indulgent, evoking the glow of a setting sun with a touch of lingering complexity._
Method: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker; Fill with ice & shake; Double strain into chilled Coupe glass; Garnish with an orange twist

Subtitle: GREY GOOSE
Description: Crisp and elegant, with the smooth, clean essence of vodka subtly accented by the dry, briny touch of vermouth. Each sip is sleek and refined, offering a cool, poised sophistication that lingers with a hint of chill.
Method: Put all ingredients into chilled mixing glass; Fill with ice & stir until cold; Strain into frozen Martini glass; Garnish with lemon twist or olives

Subtitle: GRAIN SHAKER
Description: A vibrant blend of tangy cranberry, zesty lime, and the smooth warmth of vodka, rounded by a hint of orange liqueur. Each sip is bright and playful, with a refreshing, slightly tart finish that feels effortlessly chic.
Method: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker; Fill with ice & shake; Double strain into chilled coupe glass; Garnish with flamed orange zest

Subtitle: MCHENRY CLASSIC DRY GIN
Description: A delicate and floral harmony of gin's botanical notes, the subtle sweetness of maraschino liqueur, and the tangy brightness of lemon. A whisper of crème de violette lends a soft, ethereal finish, evoking the elegance of a twilight sky.
Method: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker; Fill with ice and shake; Double strain into chilled Coupe glass; Garnish with lemon zest or maraschino cherry

Subtitle: UNICO
Description: Vibrant sweetness of mandarin oranges, lifted by crisp bubbles and a hint of herbal bitterness. Each sip is light and zesty, offering a sunlit effervescence that’s both refreshing and effortlessly uplifting.
Method: Add all ingredients to glass; Fill with ice & stir; Garnish

Subtitle: OKAR
Description: A bold and velvety blend of rich espresso, smooth vodka, and a touch of coffee liqueur. Each sip is an indulgent burst of bittersweet coffee flavour, with a creamy, invigorating finish that feels both luxurious and energizing.
Method: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker; Fill with ice & shake; Double strain into a chilled Coupe glass; Garnish

Subtitle: MCHENRY/STEINBOK
Description: Smooth and citrus-forward blend of gin, fresh lemon juice, and a touch of orange liqueur. Its crisp, bright flavours are balanced by a silky texture, offering a refreshing and sophisticated sip with a clean, tart finish.
Method: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker; Shake without ice; Add ice and shake again; Double strain into a chilled Coupe glass; Garnish with a lemon twist

Subtitle: BUFFALO TRACE
Description: A Baby Guinness is a layered shot cocktail that mimics the appearance of a miniature pint of Guinness by using coffee liqueur as the base and Irish cream liqueur to create a creamy, layered effect.
Method: Fill a shot glass 2/3 full with Kahlua; Pour the Irish cream over the back of a spoon. It will layer on top of the Kahlua and form the head that makes this cocktail look like Guinness

Subtitle: ACT OF TREASON
Method: Pour the ingredients into a shot glass; Cover the glass with a napkin and your hand; Slam the glass on the bar counter; Drink while it’s still fizzing

Subtitle: ACT OF TREASON
Description: These shots taste just like a classic margarita, so they are not too sweet and not too strong, so everyone is guaranteed to love the taste.
Method: Run a wedge of lime around the rim of each shooter glass; Roll the edge of the shooter into the salt; Add the tequila, Cointreau and lime juice to a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well; Strain into the prepared shooter glasses, add any optional garnish and serve

Subtitle: BUFFALO TRACE
Method: Add the strawberry liqueur to a shot glass; Place a small spoon gently inside the shot glass over the strawberry and slowly pour the Bailey's until it reaches near the top
